## Release Tracking

| Release | DEV (future state) | UAT | PROD |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.3.0 | pass | fail |  |
| 1.3.1 | pass | pass | todo |
| X.Y.Z |  |  |  |

NOTICE:
There is no DEV env, so UAT is updated just after tag creation.

## Deployment

- DAGs code is not merged to environment branches (no branch-deploy)
- main contains definition and configuration of each environment
- tag (of its own repo) is used as reference of DAGs version to use for deployment

| Create a repository on GitHub | Create a repository on GitHub Repo-1 in customer-pipeline-xxx format | customer-pipeline-xxx |
| Create a repository on GitHub Repo-2 in customer-analysis-xxx format | customer-analysis-xxx |  |
| Github branch rule protection | Create branch protection rule | How to Create Branch Protection Rule for Customer Repos. |
| Onboard data infrastructure | Run - project-pipeline-template / According to solution/parameter matrix (Output Customer-pipeline-repo and terragrunt.hcl) | https://github.com/inventanalytics/tf-infrastructure/blob/main/README.md |
| Customer repository and init scripts operations | https://github.com/inventanalytics/pipeline-project-template/blob/main/README.md |  |
| Open airflow and make sure working correctly | customer-pipeline-xxx deploy.yml & airflow check |  |

Open airflow and make sure working correctly | customer-pipeline-xxx deploy.yml & airflow check |  |
| Granting ivox SP permissions. | The ivox application must be added as a Contributor to the inventxxxshared blob. (Azure Customer) | It will be corrected in the onboard template. |
| cheetah-sp permissions | Define Storage Blob Data Contributor authority to cheetah-sp in inventcustomer and inventcustomershared storage accounts (Azure Customer) | It will be corrected in the onboard template. |
| Execution of xxx-storage-key operations. | The xxx-storage-key should be renamed to the inventxxx-storage-key format and added to both invent-prod-eu-vault and invent-key-vault. (Azure Customer) | It will be corrected in the onboard template. |

od-eu-vault and invent-key-vault. (Azure Customer) | It will be corrected in the onboard template. |
| Granting permissions for prod-eu(us,uae)-xxx-databricks. | The Databricks service principal should be granted Storage Blob Data Owner and Contributor permissions on inventcustomer and inventcustomershared storage accounts. (Azure Customer) | It will be corrected in the onboard template. |
